title: About | %%BRAND_NAME%%
description: What this site is, what it is not, and how it is funded.
main_html:
About

About %%BRAND_NAME%%

Educational guides and market navigation — built for clarity, transparency, and responsible publishing.

What this site is

  • Educational content that explains common topics and points you to official resources.
  • Navigation tools (by city and topic) to help you find the right kind of licensed professional or official agency.
  • Plain-language frameworks to help you ask better questions and compare options responsibly.

What this site is not

  • Not professional advice. Always consult qualified professionals for decisions.
  • Not a ranking site. We do not publish "best" or "top" lists and we do not endorse providers.
  • Not a referral service. We do not collect referral fees or commissions for contacting providers.

How this site is funded

We may display paid advertising placements labeled Advertising. Advertising does not change editorial content. See Advertising & Provider Info for details.

How to contact us

Use the Contact page for general inquiries, feedback, or to report an issue.
